Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: cmmusselman
Reviews.Content: My stay in May of 2012 at Sierra Suites, as usual, was excellent. The owners are very people oriented and try to accomodate you as best they can and try to make your stay as comfortable as possible. They even have different games and have cookouts for their customers. The rooms and pool area are very clean. I would recommend to anyone staying at Sierra Suites in Daytona Beach is a great idea!

Reviews.Title: “Great Vacation Spot”
Reviews.Author: bradysmom07
Reviews.Content: This was a lovely place to stay while we were on a family vacation. It was kid friendly and the rooms were clean. Had a nice pool and wonderful off the deck access to the beach. Will be going back to stay there again while in Florida. Great experience.

Reviews.Title: “We love our vacation!!”
Reviews.Author: Pvhmgr191
Reviews.Content: Keep coming here year after year. Beautiful place with a beautiful view. Brought our 6 month old Grandson this year to start him off in the prettiest place in Daytona. Nice, friendly, clean atmosphere where great memories are made and new friends become family. Thanks for the memories. See ya next year!! The Harris Family...Union City, TN

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: Bugaboo65
Reviews.Content: Great place on the beach. No parking! Access to the beach is private and safe. Rooms are ok but not great. Very kid friendly. Pool area is great. Great restaurants near by, no eateries on premises. No bathroom near pool. No elevator but only 2 floors so luggage is manageable. No fitness center. Great for families.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyable/Relaxing Vacation”
Reviews.Author: lshasenf
Reviews.Content: We just came back from staying 7 days at Sierra Suites on Daytona Beach, Fl. We found our vacation to be very enjoyable and relaxing. Plenty of outside furniture for you around the pool area or on the pool deck facing the ocean. Plenty of seating on your porch area and in the very nice courtyard. The owner lives on site and you will most likely always spot him around the property checking on things and constantly cleaning. Rick and Ada want you to be comfortable and are interested in wanting you to be pleased and happy. This is a small, very family oriented premise with a great atmosphere. You will find grocery stores and drug stores within a short driving distance. The locked entrance to the beach leaves you with a safe feeling. We also enjoyed the use of the grills in the courtyard area. We would certainly look forward to being their guests again!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Mike M
Reviews.Content: I found this to be a relaxing, enjoyable place to stay. Great beach access! I found the rooms to be very clean, I actually witnessed them cleaning and they do a superior job. Rich cleans the floors on his hands and knees, how many owners do you know that do that? I don't smoke, but Rich does and noticed that he doesn't smoke in any of the rooms and didn't find that anything in the rooms smelled of smoke. The Rich and Ada were always available, came around often to see if we were enjoying our stay and actually played cornhole with us on the deck. We had a great time! We will be going back next year!

Reviews.Title: “Owners are very accommodating”
Reviews.Author: Debbie L
Reviews.Content: I would like to comment on the negative review regarding the owners. I will be spending my 2nd week at Sierra Suites in August. I go there twice a year for a relaxing and fun filled vacation. You couldn't ask for better hosts than Rick and Ada. Yes, the oceanside parking lot is very small and can only hold a handful of vehicles. This is why the one car per unit requirement is there. However, if you have someone joining you that has a vehicle, all you have to do is let Rick or Ada know and they will gladly allow you to park that vehicle across the street. It's not fair to the other guests for people to try and cram as many folks into one unit, after the fact, in order to get a smaller unit at a more reasonable price. If there were to be extra's that will be joining someone, they should look into renting the 3 bedroom 2.5 bath. My sister and niece may be coming up from Fort Myers while I'm staying at Sierra Suites next month. I have already notified Rick and Ada of this and that they will be needing to park their Chevy Avalance across the street. Rick has no problem with this and thanked me for notifying me in advance. If you want a big place with a big parking lot, there are many hotels on Daytona and the surrounding beaches where you can share the pool with 100s of people, listen to loud music, wait for elevators and be around alot of drinking. Rick and Ada run a quiet and relaxing resort. Somewhere where you can forget about your problems and just kick back, have fun and relax. Rick and Ada give you their cell phone number and its posted on the premises. They also live on the premises. Having stayed at the Sierra Suites for a few years now, I know that Rick would have done whatever he could have to help this family out . . . . especially if there was an illness.

Reviews.Title: “7 year old's vacation ruined”
Reviews.Author: Stephanie A
Reviews.Content: First of all, I do not know where the "wonderful" owners were at! I guess they took the week off because I have never been so humilitated by him in my entire life. My 7 year old daughter and I had been looking forward to spending a week with family, but instead turned out to be a nightmare. My husband came to visit us the 3rd day we were there to celebrate his birthday with us. He parked his vehicle across the street (they have NO parking). We went to dinner and around midnight, the owner was calling my Aunt stating that the guy in the truck needs to leave now. My husband did not plan on spending the night but he had gotten sick after dinner(we had 11 people, 6 adults and 5 children in a 2 bedroom with 4 queen size beds and a sofa sleeper, we had plenty of room for him to stay one night). We tried to explain this to Mr. Wonderful but he all he kept telling my family was that we need to pack up now and leave. I did pack up my child, while in her pajamas, and we left. My child cried the entire 2 hour drive back home. Now on Sunday, I told the owner that I was going to park my car at the garage so he would not complain about the cars taking up his small parking lot. He told me that I did not need to do that, just park across the street. One minute he tells you can do something and when you do it, he is calling you asking you why you did that. He is very contradicting. Now I will tell you that this place is by far the best spot on the beach. Great rooms, great pool, great access to the beach, but all that is useless when you have to beware of a contradicting OWNER. Thanks for your "hospitality"! My family may come back to stay, but I will not. Thank you for making a memory that will last a lifetime for my 7 year old and me having to explain to her why we had to leave. How can she understand it, when I can't.

Reviews.Title: “Peaceful & Relaxing Vacation!”
Reviews.Author: Wyn M
Reviews.Content: I just spent 9 days in Daytona & stayed at Sierra Suites for the first time with some friends of mine. My goal was to truly vacation & get some rest, and that is just what I did! I didn't have to deal with so many people, waiting on elevators or sharing the pool with 100 people! Call me selfish, but that's what I call a good vacation! The rooms were CLEAN & a maid wasn't beating on my door trying to come in & clean while I was in there. If I needed anything, the owners were right there, or maybe a phone call away. I visited four of the rooms while there, and all were clean. I actually witnessed the owners, Rick & Ada, thoroughly cleaning the rooms with bleach, which impressed me. It's right on the beach, and I left my personal items at the pool & went to the beach at will & never worried about them going missing. Only guests are allowed at the pool area & to access the beach from Sierra Suites. The gate is locked & only its patrons have access keys. Another great point is that there are grills away from the pool area, so you can throw on some steaks, burgers or kabobs at any time & then walk a few steps to the pool area when done. I will definitely refer others to Sierra Suites & hope to return again next year if schedule permits!

Reviews.Title: “Daytona 2012”
Reviews.Author: BuzbeeFamily
Reviews.Content: Just completed 9 days in Daytona while enjoying our stay at Sierra Suites. This made 14 years we've been staying here. I can't say enough wonderful things about this place. Its always clean and tidy. The owners Rich and Ada are wonderful. You are just steps away from the beach and pool, no elevators!! I love that there are only 9 rooms, thats makes it great when out by the pool there is plenty of room, not like the big high rises that hold 200 or more guests. Make sure you check this place out on your next vacation, you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: “The best place for our family!”
Reviews.Author: Lenya W
Reviews.Content: This is the best hotel on the beach for anyone who hates elevators and resorts! Its quiet, clean, has everything you need for a fun beach trip. We have been staying at Sierra Suites off and on for over 14 years. Lots of comfy sleeping space, pool, easy access to beach, shuffle board, plenty of patio tables, poolside furniture, privacy if you want it, grills, close to everything! The managers/owners know what they are doing! I hate to tell everyone how great it is because I dont want the place to fill up before I book my next vacation! Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: “Recent Stay - Coke Zero 400”
Reviews.Author: Tom M
Reviews.Content: Just finished another great week staying at the Sierra Suites for the summer race at Daytona. We have always enjoyed the atmosphere and hospitality provided by the owners (Rick & Ada Harman). What great people to deal with!!!!!! No, you don't have valet parking, concierge services, someone to carry your bags to your room or anything that the Waldorf-Astoria offers but what you get is a good value and a relaxed family setting.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: MMKKus4
Reviews.Content: We have been going to Sierra Suites since 1994. We rebook our week every year before we leave. There is no other place like it in Daytona. You step out of your condo onto the pool deck and right down the stairs to the beach. We absolutely love the place. The owners are great people and always just a call away if you need anything. There is such a nice feel. No high rise just small and family friendly. We always tend to make friends with the other families staying there. We plan to keep returning as long as we can! BTW we love the new Windows you put in Rick :) ~The Koons.

Reviews.Title: “great week at Sierra Suites”
Reviews.Author: barbara m
Reviews.Content: I Love staying at Sierra Suites....there's not many places left on Daytona Beach like it. We have been going to Daytona since the late 60's. So glad we found this small pink gem. The owners Rick and Ada feel like family to us. The corn hole games are rigged (like that Rick?) lol Bruce and Rick are hard to beat....but we brought some young nephews who could do it! Rain was interrupting the games but get ready cause we'll be back in December. If you are looking for a clean comfortable place to stay right on the beach and no fighting over chairs then this is the place...book early because the word is spreading. Once people stay they book for the next year. Love"our" Sierra Suites. Remind me in Dec. Rick to give you my camera card so you can post pics Great place for a wedding by the way...check it out you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Great Spot for a Family Vacation”
Reviews.Author: kellen s
Reviews.Content: Our family has been coming to Daytona for more than 60 yrs, and we have always stayed at great "mom and pop" type hotels. In recent years, a lot of these hotels have gone away. We are so happy we found the Sierra Suites this year!!! We rented the 3 bedroom/ 2.5 bath suite. Let me say the view from our balcony was beautiful!!! It was wonderful to wake up each morning and watch the waves while drinking coffee. We also loved the freedom of having the beach 50 feet from our door. It was so easy to just come and go from the beach as we pleased. The whole set up of the hotel is just perfect. The place is very clean and family friendly. They have an awesome pool area, complete with plenty of seating and umbrellas. Also, the owner has set up a bean bag toss game and shuffle board games for guests to enjoy. I can't say enough about the owner and his wife! They were so pleasant. We played bean bag toss with them almost every night. We also loved having a grill in the court yard. We love to cook out during our family stay, so having one right on the property was great. We have already booked our trip for next year! Sierra Suites is our new family tradition!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay at Sierra Suites”
Reviews.Author: es3918
Reviews.Content: Our family vacation at the Sierra Suites was excellent...very clean and great beach access. Rick was a excellent host and we can't wait to return.

Reviews.Title: “Great spot for vacations!”
Reviews.Author: Jackie_Christ
Reviews.Content: Very friendly owners!!! Since we've met them, we have become more friends now although they are still owners. Have been many years in a row in Florida, at various places, and this is the best place we have found!!! We will go back next year without any hesitation.

Reviews.Title: “Our beautiful vacation at Sierra Suites”
Reviews.Author: Pat3912
Reviews.Content: Just back yesterday June 8th, 2012 after spending 11 days at the Sierra Suites. All my husband and I can say is that it is the closest place to home. The owners Rick and Ada are very kind and helpful people. They are always around chatting and keeping the place in perfect shape. Everything is very clean and extremely spacious. There are 9 units and they is always one for your family. This was our 5th stay at the Sierra Suites and we are already planning next November 2013 to return. You will not be disappointed if you book there. Two very happy Cowansville Quebec Canada tourists!!!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location for Relaxation”
Reviews.Author: budtripper
Reviews.Content: Stayed a week with a frequent guest of the place. It was everything thing they said and more. Very impressed. Stay in a 3 bedroom and was amazed by the amenities it had, a home away from home. The owners, Rick and Ada, were very helpful and friendly. They really made us feel welcomed. The ocean view from the second floor balcony was beautiful, specially at sunrise. The location was perfect for releasing the stress from your ordinary life and just relaxing, whether by the pool, the ocean, or even in the room. Should I ever make it back that way again, I hope to be able to stay there again. It was one of the best trips I've had in a long time.

Reviews.Title: “Our Favorite Place In Daytona”
Reviews.Author: Dale111
Reviews.Content: We have been going to Flordia since 1970 and have stayed at various motels mostly in the Daytona area. When we found the Sierra Suites we liked what they had to offer, at that time it was not owned by Ric and Ada. We sort of adopted this motel as our vacation spot. A few years later Ric and Ada bought this motel and the changes for the better really started. They redid the landscaping, bought new patio furniture, redid the guest units, remodeled the rooms, added new furniture, tvs, bedding ect. overall made it a very welcoming place to spend ones vacation. Ric and Ada are a husband and wife team who do their bookings, cleaning and fixing when it has to be done, they do it all. They are the most congenial people you will ever meet. They will bend over backwards to make your vacation as pleasant as possible. This is a small motel, 9 units consisting of 1, 2 & 3 bedroom units and a one kitchenette unit. Since Ric and Ada bought we have stayed in 7 of the 9 units going to Daytona once or twice a year for 1 month at a time. Anyone sending a bad review of this motel would have hate in their heart as this is the cleaniest, most cheerful small motel we have been in and as long as Ric and Ada own it and God willing we will be staying at this place when we visit Florida. A true paradise for us. Bill and Jackie, Martintown On Canada

Reviews.Title: “GLAD I FOUND "THE ONE"”
Reviews.Author: Tobster2514
Reviews.Content: Family oreinted ,very clean and friendly, we will return over and over again . Rick and I can't be stopped in corn hole . American Owned and operated ! Thanks for hospitality and see you next year! Loyal customer for life!

Reviews.Title: “My experience”
Reviews.Author: Kathy D
Reviews.Content: I spent the end of may beginning of June at the serria suites and it was a very nice place it was a very very clean hotel and American own very pretty rooms and well taken care of ..we really enjoyed staying here at this hotel Rick and Ada owners made you feel like family. I would recommend this place to anyone wanting to ahave a family vacation to go to serria suites in daytona beach once you go there you well want to go back every year its like home away from home . You are on the beach close to the board walk and close to the shopping malls .freindly people ,very clean rooms and pretty too well kept beautiful view it wag a great vacation .rick and Ada where very helpful if I needed to go somewhere they told me how to get there gave us the best places to eat at had a cook out for all of us . I will be going back .and I hope that you well go there as well because you and your family will enjoy it the most important thing to me when I go on vacation is clean rooms and friendly people and you will get this at serria serria suites. Thank you Rick and Ada for the great time I had at your hotel and I will recommend you to all my friends and family?tank you Kathy from ga

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Vacation Spot”
Reviews.Author: Wolffrat
Reviews.Content: Just returned from another fabulous week spent at the Sierra Suites and am counting the days until I return in August. Sierra Suites is the best kept secret on Daytona Beach. The owners, Rick and Ada, take great pride in keeping their property white glove clean and make sure that each and every guest are having the best vacation possible. The apartments are up-to-date with everything you can imagine, and more, for your home away from home. Rick and Ada live onsite so you have immediate access to them should you have a need or want. I have never been to a place where the owner’s actually take the time to sit with you in the evenings and chat, or play a challenging game of corn hole. To Rick and Ada, you are not guests, you are family and that’s important. When I’m at Sierra Suites I feel like 20 years of stress is immediately lifted from my body. I go home feeling rested and relaxed and count the days until my next visit. Whether I travel alone or with friends and family, I always feel safe and secure. If you’re looking for a party place, this is not it; however, if you’re looking for a very clean, well-kept property (inside and out), and a relaxing, fun, and enjoyable vacation spot . . . Sierra Suites is the place for you.

Reviews.Title: “Clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: tikikitty
Reviews.Content: Rooms are very clean no bugs. Beautiful views, easy access to beach, will be back next year.

Reviews.Title: “Restful Spot”
Reviews.Author: Robin P
Reviews.Content: We were traveling with a group of teenagers and the hotel they were staying in was completely booked. I remembered seeing this hotel next door last year when we were there and decided to give it a try. The thing we liked most was that they had a 3 bedroom 2 1/2 bath suite that us parents could share. We all loved it. The suite was very comfortable and we had a view of the ocean. Loved having the full kitchen and a living room. We are planning to come back next year and bring our other kids and my mom. I know we will all be very comfortable and can't wait to return.

Reviews.Title: “Family fun”
Reviews.Author: Charles H
Reviews.Content: Usually I travel solo, so I was a little nervous to find a nice place to bring my family. From the other reviews I decided to give this place a try. I was very impressed, we had a great time and it was very family friendly and tailored to kids! It was very clean and the furniture was all very comfortable!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to bring your family”
Reviews.Author: Mailman40383
Reviews.Content: Second year in a row we have stayed here, and we love it!! Very clean and comfortable rooms. It is such a nice location for a family to stay and enjoy relaxation. The location on the beach is perfect. It is very close to whatever you need (shopping, ect.) but it is not busy and not crowded. We loved not having to go up 12 flights of stairs to get to our room. We loved playing corn hole on the deck and enjoyed the pool as well. Rick, the owner was always on hand if we needed anything, and was a gracious host. We used the grills several nights to grill out and ate on the deck. We will be visiting again very soon. Thanks to Rick and his wife for making our beach vacation so wonderful. Thad and Kelly Baker and kids:)

Reviews.Title: “Nice place right on the beach. Great for families.”
Reviews.Author: Dawn F
Reviews.Content: Nice place right on beach. Very clean and comfortable. Has pretty much everything you need for a nice, relaxing, and enjoyable stay. Owners are very nice. Would definitely go back again.

Reviews.Title: “The best place to stay in Daytona!”
Reviews.Author: vangie525
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful place to stay on the beach. I have never met such gracious hosts as Rick and Ada Harman. You will never find more personal service anywhere.We were treated as guests not just another number. We have stayed at highrise condos before but never again. Where else would you find the owner helping out when the keys were locked in the car? Where else would you be treated to Krispie Creme doughnuts fresh and warm? Where else would you have the owners light the chimnea and sit and chat with you? No where that I know of. The room was comfortable,clean and such cozy beds. I love Sierra Suites and will be back next year!!! Thank you Rick and Ada. Vangie Hunsicker and John lapierre

Reviews.Title: “Make good friends--Good owners & neighbors”
Reviews.Author: Sally M
Reviews.Content: We have found the motel we have been looking for, Sierra Suites is it !!! Rick &Ada do everything they can to make your stay enjoyable. The rooms are large & clean & very comfortable. A nice pool & updated ocean deck with plenty of lounge chairs & tables for everyone.Richard & Ada Harman are the greatest owners on the beach,they treat you like good friends, always helpful. I would highly say, this is it, our place in the sun & your stay would be very enjoyable. Roy & Sally

Reviews.Title: “Twice is nice”
Reviews.Author: barbara m
Reviews.Content: Well, have to say Sierra Suites is The best place on Daytona Beach...Bruce and I and our sidekicks Donna and Jimmy spent our first of many January days on the beach.There isn't a better place on the beach than Sierra Suites. Daytona Beach is our vacation spot and has been since the 70's. We tried a good many places and Rick and Ada's is the best you'll find. Easy access to the ocean (no elevator needed) They can accomodate large families and couples. We will be there again this summer. This was our first winter trip.....met other "winter couples" and of course played corn hole every day. We hope to stay there again next January with Wilma and Ed. Rick practice the throwing and we'll see you and Ada in June!!!...with the rest of our group.

Reviews.Title: “Our Home away from Home in Daytona Beach !!”
Reviews.Author: Superior_Dave
Reviews.Content: Sierra Suites in Daytona Beach FL is our home away from home ... We have been coming to Daytona Beach since the mid 90's at least twice a year and we have stayed at many of the beachside establishments over the years. Since finding Sierra Suites we have stayed in several of the suites ranging from the spacious 3 bedroom with the whole family, to the smaller 1 bedroom efficiency for just me and the wife. You can trust when I say there is no finer place than this one. Rick and Ada Harman (owners) are operating the best suites in town. The units are clean, well equipped, and very comfortable with cable TV and High Speed wireless internet throughout the property (for the working vacations) ... The pool is spacious with more chairs than possibly needed, so no need to get up at 7 AM to tag a chair with your towel ... Rick and Ada have always treated our family as if we were theirs ... We would be disappointed if we came to Daytona Beach and could not stay here ... 5 stars !!!

Reviews.Title: “Virginia "Peachy" Frick Sierra Suites is the best Hotel its Fantastic in Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: Virginia F
Reviews.Content: Myself n family stayed at Sierra Suites in Daytona Beach an it was our first time and we loved every mint. of the trip . We stayed 2 weeks n didn't want to leave. I have been comming to FLA. in the Daytona Beach area since the late 90's n i have never met the nice's people with Rick & Ada they treated us liked family. The hotel was just beautiful, n super clean well equipped with the comforts of home. The pool n courtyard was great n the acess's to the beach was right there to. My brother -in law said to tell you guys he had a great time playing corn hole with Rick & Ada he said it was fun, but i will say these people know how to treat their guests. We had the best time n i will say without a second that we will be back guaranteed!!!! we will never stay anywhere else in Daytona Beach Fla. I can't wait to come back to Sierra Suites. It also was oct-fest 2011 with the bikers n that was a blast the first time for me (Virginia "Peachy" Frick) Thanks to Rick & Ada Many,Many thanks n we will see you guys again,maybe sooner then we think or you as long as there is a open spot we will fill it up for you guys thanks so much for all that you did n showed us a great time Rick &Ada you guys have a great place there at Sierra Suites keep up the great work u do there n thank you all ...... ;) VIRGINA "PEACHY" FRICK N FAMILY you will see me again Thanks for being the great people you are thats what keeps the people coming back.............

Reviews.Title: “More than Expected!”
Reviews.Author: andrem20
Reviews.Content: Hospitality unmatched!! And the suite was just perfect! Clean, spacious, and filled with everything you can think of....and more! From the moment I spoke with Rick on the phone I knew this place was different. There total focus here is on treating the customer right. I booked a 3 bedroom suite for my friends and I for a recent trip to Daytona. When we arrived we were all floored by the suite and it's amenities. We were greeted by the more than helpful staff and they helped us in every way possible. It's like owning your own private condo right on the beach. I am an Avid traveler so I've seen it all, and I can say without a doubt that we will never stay anywhere else in Daytona. Guaranteed!

Reviews.Title: “Sierra Suites Is A Fantastic Hotel In Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: Carol S
Reviews.Content: My better half and I stayed here at Sierra Suites in Daytona Beach, Fl. for over a week, over labor day Sept/2011 we can't say enough about this fantastic hotel and owners Rick & Ada they treated us like family :) The hotel is just beautiful, super clean, comfortable beds, well equipped with all the comforts of home, very nice pool, courtyard and patio's. I just loved the huge dolphin fountain ! Sierra Suites beach front location is just fantastic. We really enjoyed playing the corn hole game out on the patio with Rick & Ada it was a blast ! This was our first time staying at Sierra Suites and I can guarantee it will not be our last, we will go back to Sierra Suites. Talk about southern hospitality Sierra Suites definitely has it. Many, Many Thanks Rick & Ada

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: Steve D
Reviews.Content: We had a great time at Sierra Suites. We loved the great family atmosphere the owners Rick & Ada are very nice. The rooms are very clean and spacious. Sierra Suites is a small quite place to enjoy the beach .The pool area was great and had an easy beach access. Can't wait to go back next year.

Reviews.Title: “Best Daytona Motel”
Reviews.Author: Teresa K
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have stayed at Sierra Suites the past two years during spring break. We have gone to Daytona the last 25 years. The two at Sierra Suites have definitely been the best (as far as places to stay). The owners are more than reasonable and accommodating. The atmosphere is very friendly and like family. The rooms (we have stayed in two different ones) have been immaculate. We are planning to spend a couple of months in Florida (January and February) soon. We will certainly look into staying at Sierra Suites during those months.

Reviews.Title: “Year after year”
Reviews.Author: Heather523
Reviews.Content: Sierra Suites is by far the best place to stay in Daytona. In 2004 I wrote a review and now 7 years later here I am again. I have been going to Sierra Suites for years and wouldn't have it any other way. VERY clean rooms, comfortable beds, nice rooms, family friendly atmosphere and of course the owners Rick and Ada are amazing! They are always out and about to see if you need anything and are very welcoming. You won't find anything else like this for a place to stay. There are different sized rooms available depending on how many people are with you. You do your own cleaning and things so you don't have a housekeeper in and out of your room daily, which I really like, and if you need anything extra they will get it for you. I love it here and I can't wait to be back next year!

Reviews.Title: “What a amazing place felt like home”
Reviews.Author: ryan2656
Reviews.Content: I must say that Sierra Suites is a awesome place to stay the owners are amazing and go out of their way to make your stay as comfortable as possible!!!As soon as we arrived which i might add was earlier then are check in time they where cleaning are room on their hands and feet scrubbing the floors if a clean and home like feeling is what you are looking for on your vacation this is the place to stay!!!! I want to say thank you both so much for a great vacation i truly love your place and will be back again!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great vacation!”
Reviews.Author: Deelo818
Reviews.Content: Thank you so much for making u's feel at home. We had an awesome time. I am looking forward to next years trip. The place was great the people are friendly and the place was nice and clean. I have nothing bad to say about the place or the people it was overall a great experience. Thank you so very much!!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Love2TravelTN
Reviews.Content: A friend and I went to the Florida coast in hopes of seeing a shuttle launch. After searching forever for an available and affordable hotel we stumbled upon the Sierra Suites. This is a very unique property - with only a few rooms (seven, I think). They are more like condos than rooms as they have a full kitchen and washer/dryer. We originally booked a one-bedroom, but the owner showed us a three-bedroom unit on the second floor that overlooked the pool and beach. We decided to splurge on it. The kitchen was excellent--new appliances and such. The living room/dining area was very comfortable. They had a large TV but didn't find many station available (who cares, you are on the beach). The beds were comfortable, and the bathrooms - while dated - were fully functional. This place reminded me more of staying with friends or family than a 'luxury' vacation like the Ritz or high end chain hotel. There were only a few rooms occupied when we were there, so generally had the place to ourselves. If you consider keep in mind this is an older property, but one with lots of charter and friendly owners who live just across the street. There is limited parking, so that might be an issue with a large group. This is probably the best place to stay in Daytona--for anyone over 25, anyway. Would definitely return. (One more note, no elevator - so if staying on the second floor be aware you have to carry all that stuff you brought up the stairs!) Also, they have free WiFi!

Reviews.Title: “It's Paridise on the Beach !!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Ladydia1
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at Sierra Suites several times and absolutly love it. The rooms are clean , well kept and the owners Rick & Ada are the nicest people I have ever met. They have cook outs on the holidays for all the guest. Everyone brings something and they supply all the meat and alot of other food. It lets you get to know the people and to have a really good time. I have met some very nice people from Canada there .I have never stayed at a motel with this kind of hospitality. You don't find this very much anymore and believe you me I enjoy it when I get it. I work for the government and I take my laptop with me and I get great reception in my room, at the pool on down at the shuffle board area., any where I go I have great reception. I will continue to stay at this motel as long as the good LORD above lets me travel and take vacations. Hopefully a long time !!! If I need anything Rick & Ada are on the spot getting it. I will recomend this motel to anyone. You won't find a nicer place in Daytona Beach .

Reviews.Title: “Wow!!! What a terrific motel”
Reviews.Author: cmmusselman
Reviews.Content: Our service was the best. The rooms were clean, spacious and very accomodating. The location is perfect to go do pretty much anything you can think of to do in Fl. The best thing about this motel is the friendly motel owners. They will go to the ends of the earth to make your stay is a pleasant one and to make sure you come back and stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great place!!!!”
Reviews.Author: tikikitty
Reviews.Content: The suite was spacious and clean with washer & dryer in the room. Decorated beautifully! I love the easy beach access. I can't wait to go back.

Reviews.Title: “will be back”
Reviews.Author: hammer3690
Reviews.Content: great family place little family owned place parking the only problem

Reviews.Title: “Serria Suite OK”
Reviews.Author: mercys
Reviews.Content: Just spent 5 days at Serria Suites in Daytona. We had the 1 BR,2 bath condo. Clean and nice small view of ocean. Nice breeze when we opened the window. The pool and patio area right on the beach. We stayed on the patio and felt like it was on the beach.We were very pleased. The efficency next door was only 1 room and small. OK if not planning to spend time in room. We will go back again.

Reviews.Title: “Favorite place to stay”
Reviews.Author: laydivictoria
Reviews.Content: I have been coming down to Daytona Beach for the last 6 years for Bike Week. This place is very clean, people are friendly. I would recommend this place to both friends and family. The only difference i noticed between this year and the past was the new owners. My only minor complaint was that they did not have our room ready the day we got there and had to stay in another for one day and the condiments such as detergents, towels, wash cloths were not as abundant as in the past and they need... pot holders so you don't burn your hands getting things out of the oven. All in all i would rate this place a 4 star.

Reviews.Title: “Fall Break, From Raceland Ky”
Reviews.Author: firef
Reviews.Content: We have been comming here for the last 4 years. The place had changed some since the summer of 2005, but was still as friendly and homey as ever. Our trips here started out as family of 5, then another family of 3 joined and a day later more friends a family of 4. In 2005 there was a total of 19 of us there and we loved it. Rick and Ada are great, we can't wait to come back in June 2007.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This hotel is the best one we've stayed in while in Daytona Beach!! The owners are extremely nice and they keep the place very clean. We've been coming here now for 2 yrs in a row, we will continue to make our reservations here every Summer!! We were also married in Daytona Beach this Summer and we had a wonderful time!!!

Reviews.Title: “did we stay at the same place as these reviews?”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Where do I begin? There is nowhere to park. The manager practically pushed me out of the office so he could get back to whatever he was doing. The rooms smelled like insecticide. This was confirmed when we found a dead palmetto bug (cockroach) in a cabinet. The sheets and blankets feel like they were slept on by someone else.

Reviews.Title: “affordable fun in the sun”
Reviews.Author: lunchdiva
Reviews.Content: This is our second summer to stay at sierra suites. It was good last year. Great this year. We had the oceanfront upstairs 3 bedroom suite. wonderful. Washer and dryer, clean suits everyday to wear to the beach. Dishwasher to help with the dishes. Grill to cook our hamburgers and ribeyes on. big enough suite that it could easily be a full time residence. Loved it. we did have a small ant problem but one call to office and we had our own can of ant spray. We've already made our reservations for next year.

Reviews.Title: “*Awsome Place To Stay*”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: *This is the best hotel ever*This my my family and our one of our closest friends and his family 2nd time going to daytona and stayin here*The management is great rick and ada are awsome checkin on you to see if you send anything and if everything is ok*It is an awsome beach front hotel there is a heated pool and everything it is awsome*You always get to meet knew people and friends the past 2 years there has been these really nice gurls that stayed there and we became good friends last year and we still keep in touch*So if your looking for a good hotel to stay at this is the one*Everything about it is awsome* *April*

Reviews.Title: “Great spot”
Reviews.Author: Dale111
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to spend a vacation. I have stayed at this motel since the new owners Rick & Ada took over as owners and managers and I have recomended it to all my friends. They are always helpful when you have any questions and also if you just want to chat.always have time for you. I will be going back again and again. See you soon guys. Dale Lafave

Reviews.Title: “my favorite place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Heather523
Reviews.Content: My family and I have stayed at this motel for 4 years and already have this summer booked!! It is a wonderful place to stay and all of this is coming from a 17 yr old...my family and friend and i have tons of fun each year we've gone and this will be my friends third year with us. rick and ada are very nice people and always checking to make sure your okay and if you need anything. i love the way they have remodeled the place and they have nice sons too. i love staying here because you get to know the others staying with u and i always meet friends especially the ones that stayed there last year when we were there, and we still keep in touch! overall this is a great place to stay and i recommend it to everyone looking for a nice, and resonable priced place to stay!!~~Heather~~

Reviews.Title: “Great place”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have stayed at this motel for 6 years, 3 with previous owners and 3 now with the present owners Rick and Ada. These people are just the best hosts you could find. always willing to help you in any way. It is a great place to stay being a small motel you get to know the other tenants quickly. All units are well furnished and very clean, we always have a great vacation here. We are looking forward to returning again this year. Bill & Jackie.

Reviews.Title: “fair price clean rooms good managment”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I have stayed twice at sierra suites. Managment has been helpful and friendly. It is an older hotel but rooms have been remodeled and it is kept clean. Prices are reasonable. I will certainly stay again. I guess when you abide by rules life is good for all
